section.p: You advance, weapon at the ready. As you draw closer, something rushes out of the cave with a shrieking cry. It is the gorlock, a beast with legs like a bird, a body like a reptile, with two short forelimbs and a beaked, lizard-like head. Its two legs do indeed have backward-pointing feet. You’ll have to fight.
If you win, . If you lose, your bones will join the others at the entrance of the cave, unless you have a resurrection deal.
